alert.note: Alert for Butts; Lamar; Monroe; Pike; Spalding; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 2:12PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Spalding, central Pike, northwestern Monroe, north central Upson, southern Butts and Lamar Counties through 245 PM EST... At 210 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was over Lifsey Springs, or near Zebulon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Barnesville, Jackson, Forsyth, Zebulon, Flovilla, Milner, Orchard Hill, Meansville, Aldora, Atwater, Goggins, Hilltop, Berner, Lifsey Springs, Chappel Mill, High Falls State Park, Blount, Liberty Hill, Collier and Piedmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central and west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Butts; Lamar; Monroe; Pike; Spalding; Upson
